alert.note: Alert for Santa Barbara County Mountains; Santa Barbara County South Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 14 at 7:57PM PST until December 15 at 3:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...North to northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 40 mph. Local gusts to 50 mph possible below favored passes and canyons, especially around Montecito. * WHERE...Santa Barbara County South Coast and Mountains. * WHEN...Until 3 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Roadways may be affected by gusty cross winds. This includes Highways 101, 154 and 192.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Santa Barbara County Mountains; Santa Barbara County South Coast
